decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to generate a large amount of mana quickly through rituals and mana rocks like Lotus Petal and Lion's Eye Diamond, and then cast a powerful spell like Ad Nauseam or Tendrils of Agony to finish off the opponent in a single turn. The deck utilizes cantrips like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Preordain to dig through the deck and find the necessary combo pieces, while also running disruption like Thoughtseize and Duress to protect the combo. The deck seeks to win the game through a lethal storm count and efficient use of resources.

The main concept of this Grixis Aggro deck is to quickly deploy threats like Delver of Secrets, Gurmag Angler, and True-Name Nemesis while disrupting opponents with a suite of counter spells and removal. The deck aims to maintain tempo advantage through efficient spells like Brainstorm, Daze, and Force of Will, while also pressuring opponents with direct damage from Lightning Bolt. Inquisition of Kozilek helps strip opponents of key cards, while card selection from Ponder and Preordain ensures consistent draws. The mana base is optimized for flexibility and access to all the necessary colors.

The main concept of this Legacy 1 vs 1 Aggro-Death's Shadow deck is to use efficient spells and card manipulation to control the game while quickly reducing your own life total to power up Death's Shadow and Gurmag Angler. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with hand disruption and counterspells, while applying pressure with fast creatures like Delver of Secrets. Utilizing a mix of removal, protection, and card draw, this deck seeks to win the game through a combination of tempo advantage and overwhelming threats.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a combination of lands and control cards. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy by using cards like Wasteland and Rishadan Port to destroy their lands and slow down their plays. Additionally, it seeks to assemble the Dark Depths-Thespian's Stage combo to create a powerful 20/20 Marit Lage token. The deck also includes cards like Punishing Fire and Life from the Loam for removal and card advantage, making it a versatile control deck focused on land interactions.

The main strategy of this deck is to utilize a combination of infect creatures and pump spells to quickly poison the opponent. By using cards like Blighted Agent and Glistener Elf alongside Berserk and Become Immense, the player can deal 10 points of poison damage in just one attack. The deck also includes protection spells like Vines of Vastwood and Force of Will to keep the combo pieces safe. With efficient mana acceleration from Noble Hierarch and disruptive cards like Daze and Spell Pierce, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its fast and deadly infect creatures.

The main concept of this UWx Control deck is to control the game by countering opponent's spells, removing threats with cards like Swords to Plowshares and Council's Judgment, and disrupting opponent's mana base with cards like Wasteland. The deck also aims to control the board with cards like Terminus and True-Name Nemesis while generating card advantage with cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Snapcaster Mage. The win condition of the deck can vary, either through attacking with creatures like True-Name Nemesis or creating a swarm of Angel tokens with Entreat the Angels.

This deck focuses on utilizing the combo of Show and Tell combined with Omniscience to cheat in powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn onto the battlefield for free. With a mix of card draw, counterspells, and tutors, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with high-impact threats. The inclusion of Cunning Wish adds versatility and flexibility to the deck, allowing for additional answers or combo pieces to be accessed from the sideboard when needed.

This deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By using efficient burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Price of Progress, along with creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Delver of Secrets, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of counterspells like Force of Will and Daze helps protect your creatures and spells from being countered or removed. The deck also includes card draw spells like Ponder and Chart a Course to maintain card advantage and keep up the pressure on the opponent.

The main concept of this Aggro - Affinity deck is to quickly overpower opponents with a combination of powerful artifact creatures and synergy with cards like Arcbound Ravager and Steel Overseer. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Choke and Wasteland to slow down opponents, while utilizing cards like Chalice of the Void to control the game. With a focus on efficient mana production and aggressive plays, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Auriok Salvagers and Lion's Eye Diamond combo to generate infinite mana and create an overwhelming board presence with cards like Sai, Master Thopterist and Walking Ballista. The deck aims to win quickly by assembling the combo pieces and overwhelming the opponent with powerful artifacts such as The Antiquities War and Karn, Scion of Urza. It also includes disruptive cards like Chalice of the Void to control the game and protect the combo. Overall, the deck focuses on fast mana generation and strong artifact synergy to secure victory.

This deck focuses on playing low-cost threats like Tarmogoyf, Delver of Secrets, and Nimble Mongoose, while disrupting opponents with counter spells such as Force of Will, Spell Snare, and Spell Pierce. The deck also utilizes cards like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Wasteland to ensure consistent card advantage and mana denial. By applying early pressure with aggressive creatures and countering key spells, Canadian Threshold aims to outpace and overwhelm opponents before they can stabilize and mount a defense.

This deck aims to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. By utilizing cards like Force of Will, Fatal Push, and Kolaghan's Command, the deck can disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect its own threats. Cards like Snapcaster Mage and Baleful Strix provide card advantage and board presence, while planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Liliana, the Last Hope offer powerful repeatable effects. The deck also includes a mix of versatile spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to set up draws and dig for the necessary answers.

The deck focuses on using counterspells and removal spells to control the opponent's board while drawing cards and gaining advantage with cards like Snapcaster Mage and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. It also utilizes cards like Portent and Predict to manipulate the top of the deck and make use of cards like Counterbalance to counter spells. The win condition comes from creatures like Monastery Mentor and Vendilion Clique, backed up by powerful board wipes like Terminus and Supreme Verdict. The mana base is streamlined to support the deck's heavy blue and white spell requirements.

The main concept of this deck is to cheat out powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn using Show and Tell and Omniscience to quickly overwhelm and overpower your opponent. The deck includes various counterspells and card draw spells to control the game and find the combo pieces needed to execute the combo efficiently. Burning Wish is included to access additional combo pieces or answers from the sideboard when needed. The deck aims to win the game through a quick and powerful combo before the opponent has a chance to react.

The main concept of this deck is to generate a high amount of mana quickly through rituals and mana accelerants like Lion's Eye Diamond and Lotus Petal, and then cast a flurry of spells in a single turn to build up storm count. The deck includes cards that allow for card selection and hand disruption, such as Brainstorm, Thoughtseize, and Duress. The end goal is to assemble the pieces necessary to cast Tendrils of Agony, a potent storm spell that deals damage to the opponent for each spell cast that turn.

The deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells while disrupting their strategy with counterspells. It aims to maintain control of the early game with cards like Delver of Secrets and Monastery Swiftspear while finishing off the opponent with direct damage like Lightning Bolt and Price of Progress. The deck also utilizes card draw and selection spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure a consistent flow of threats and answers.
